description: Ready in 3 easy steps, these delightful chocolate-hazelnut nests with colourful Easter eggs make the perfect edible decoration this Easter.
name: Easter Choc-Hazelnut Nests Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a large baking tray with baking paper.

Place chocolate and spread in a heatproof, microwave-safe bowl. Microwave, uncovered, on medium for 1 minute, stirring after 30 seconds with a metal spoon, or until melted and smooth. Stir in coconut and noodles to coat.

Using 2 tablespoonfuls of mixture at a time, spoon mixture onto tray to form ‘nests’. Using back of a spoon, make a small indention in centres. Fill indentations with chocolate eggs. Refrigerate for 2 hours or until set. Serve.
